reviews.review: The best game i have ever played!!!
este juego me entretuvo durante 6 anos siento eso es mi nuevo teclado. es muy entretenido

-Be me.
-You know how the melee system works in this game to an extent.
-You decide you want to play Demoknight on 2fort.
-You queue up for in casual mode --why do this still exist--
-Finally join and help engineers defend by chargin' at spies and other attackers.
-One spy in particular gets very salty at me.
-He accuses me of Aimbotting due to avoiding his trickstabs.
-I tell him that he needs to get "a"head.
-My team says Lol in chat.

9.8/10 would make terrible decapitation-related puns again.
O jogo ainda é divertido, mas seria melhor se os desenvolvedores dessem mais atenção a ele.
Ano je to dobré ale jsou tam strašně op hráči

Мне не понравилсь эта игра,но это не значит что она плохая. Тут проработанные персонажи,каждый со своей фишкой. Неплохая ретро стилистика и звуковое оформление. И разумеется геймплей из-за которого мне не понравилась эта игра.

100% recomendable.
Un shooter genial para divertirte jugando unas partidas rápidas.

Lo que mas me gusta de TF2:
Es un multi por equipos en el que si la cagas no pasa nada y te llevas una risa viendo tu muerte ( al contrario que otros juegos que estan pendiente a ver quien falla para insultarlo y humillarlo ).
Es muy dinámico y se necesita de reflejos.
Los personajes están muy equilibrados.
La cantidad de armas disponibles ( algunas deforman la 'realidad' )

Lo que no me gusta:
Es mas divertido cuando sabes jugar con todos los personajes. ( Si entras de nuevas y te toca con pros puede ser frustrante morir una y otra vez y no te vas a enterar ni lo que tienes que hacer )
Con la ultima actualización no puedes elegir tu mapa preferido. Tienes que elegir el paquete de mapas y esperar que te salga alguno.
Cuando tienes muchas armas tienes que elegir cual tener en inventario, ya que es limitado.
La comunidad es agradable, aunque como en todos los juegos te puedes encontrar con un pro-toxico.

You like money? you like kids raging alot? you like people trying to steal shit? You like people talking about how this is not like COD at all?

Then this game is for you. filled with real money item trading, Kids screaming at you because they suck, and unrealistic weapons everywhere. 11/10 would play again
Nie ma nic lepszego od dynamicznego fps z troche komiksowom grafikom. Co op który wystempuje i serwery społeczności zapewniom gre na długie godziny.

Very good memories.
Although the microtransactions are a problem.
Still a very good game

Amzing Game Overall 
Very good graphics
And Funny Weapons
I am a F2P noob, and I give this game a 11/10.

I love this game, its really fun to play with my friend, and i never really get bored of it, so i say 5 stars

This is a game in which you pick between sides, Red and Blue. You can choose from 9 classes and each class has its own unique weapon. You can make your character unique with hundreds of weapons, hats and more to collect, craft, buy and trade. Tweak your favorite class to suit your gameplay style and personal taste. You don’t need to pay to win—virtually all of the items in the Mann Co. Store can also be found in-game. There are many game modes you may choose from.  I hope you have found this review/summary helpful :D

Enjoy your day, 
          Sincerely
        

          Marty McFly
verry good game , not the best graphics but they are ok , i recomand to play this awesome and handsome game :)

1)Они добавили соревнавательный режим ПЛАТНЫМ... ПЛАТНЫМ БЛЯТЬ...
600р за игру и звания...
2) что бы играть в режимы в которых можно играть с  малейшим шансом выпадения вещи нужно 120р ( но это не точно)
ну и все на этом... игра идеальна...

Ich finde Team Fortress 2 ist ein super Spiel! Man kann es komplett kostenlos, oder mit premium, spielen und das finde ich gut, da nicht jeder eine menge Geld für Spiele ausgeben möchte. Am Spiel selber habe ich nichts zu bemängeln, doch die Preise für die Verspottungen könnten ein wenig günstiger sein :). Ich empfehle jedem, sich Team Fortress runterzuladen, denn es bietet viel Spielspaß, eine gute Grafik, uvm.

What to say, this game is dying, but it is somewhat good. Valve ruined the game and basically dug up the grave for it. I have to say that the game is somewhat not fair, because the balance system sucks d*ck most of the time, so you are not going to enjoy getting wrecked by a guy who has 7000 hours on this game. Maps are done nicely and the nine classes fit into the spotlight. Some classes like the spy or engi and sniper are not fun to play against, because of it's community. If you have friends i recommend playing this game with them. In the last couple months Vavle tried to fix the game and made it even worse. I don't presonally think the game is going to have an everlasting future, or even a good one. Still it is fun to play sometimes.

Came for the game.

Stayed for the hats.

+ Die einzige große dieses Spiel ist, dass es kostenlos
